MainAll news.
MainAll news.
Tuesday in Carelia: aggressive teenagers and new details of the fatal accident
In the Pitcairn district, a deceased member of the PSB was pardoned, schoolchildren in Kostomuksha beat up a local citizen, the court selected a measure to prevent a member of a fatal accident, which was said on this Tuesday.
Yesterday, 17:43
Functioned with financial support from the Ministry of Digital
communications and mass communications Russian Federation
The probable cause of the Mi-8 helicopter crashing on the Lake Onez in Carelia was identified.
The helicopter fractures were redirected to an examination in St. Petersburg, which is written by the federal media.
Today, 07:38
New Year ' s Eye has not yet been removed from the main area in the centre of Kareliyah
The authorities in the Karelia region have told us why the new annual tree is still in the middle of the city.
Today, 06:54
" Lost with the parishes " : a temple in the centre of Petrozavodska can fall from the slope
The scary tragedy could happen at any time, as the social media said by Alexander Gezalov's socialist.
Today, 06:18
The residents of Carelia were told about the conditions for obtaining preferential medicines
In the Ministry of Health, the RC reported on the possibility of obtaining preferential medicines for citizens who had experienced their absence.
Today, 5:00.
The kid had a hysterical: a schoolgirl was dropped from a bus under Petrozavodsky
The girl was dropped out of a bus outside the city, told by the mother of the affected schoolgirls in social media.
Today, 05:19

Petrozavodska's latest news today

There can be 13 settlements underwater in Carelia
Owing to anomalies, some of the human settlements are waiting for heating, which became known at a meeting of the Government of the Republic.
Today, 10:00.
The school went missing in Petrozavodsk.
It's already being searched by volunteers, and it's been reported by the search party LizaAllert.
Today, 09:36
SK was interested in taking a child out of a bus to Petrozavodsky
In fact, the audit had begun, which had been reported to the Investigation Committee press.
Today, 9:20
The inspection began after the removal of the child from the bus to Petrozavodsky
The action of the crew of the bus will verify the legality, as reported to the Carlavattrons.
Today, 08:47
Schedule of trolleybuses published in Petrozavodsk on holidays
The changes will take place at the end of February and early March, as reported to the GCO.
Today, 08:34
The route to Carelia was blocked because of a fatal accident with a fur.
At the scene of the worst accident, there are now GIBD and intelligence personnel who have reported it to the Department ' s press service.
Today, 08:16
